    FhirPathUnit.convertValue(BigDecimal value, FhirPathUnit sourceUnit, FhirPathUnit targetUnit)
    Converts a value from one unit to another, supporting same-type conversions (UCUM-to-UCUM, calendar-to-calendar) and cross-type conversions (calendar-to-UCUM, UCUM-to-calendar) where applicable.
